description: Updates the specified environment in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the domain in which the environment is to be updated.

parameters.name: glossaryTerms
parameters.description: The glossary terms to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironment action. (string) ---

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the environment that is to be updated.

parameters.name: userParameters
parameters.description: The user parameters of the environment. (dict) --- The parameter details of an evironment profile. name (string) --- The name of an environment profile parameter. value (string) --- The value of an environment profile parameter.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of an environment profile parameter.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of an environment profile parameter.

nested_items.name: awsAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services account in which the environment is to be updated.

nested_items.name: awsAccountRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region in which the environment is updated.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the environment was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the environment.

nested_items.name: deploymentProperties
nested_items.description: The deployment properties to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironment action.

nested_items.name: endTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The end timeout of the environment blueprint deployment.

nested_items.name: startTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The start timeout of the environment blueprint deployment.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironment action.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the domain in which the environment is to be updated.

nested_items.name: environmentActions
nested_items.description: The environment actions to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironment action.

nested_items.name: auth
nested_items.description: The authentication type of a configurable action of a Amazon DataZone environment.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters of a configurable action in a Amazon DataZone environment.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the configurable action parameter.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the configurable action parameter.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of a configurable action in a Amazon DataZone environment.

nested_items.name: environmentBlueprintId
nested_items.description: The blueprint identifier of the environment.

nested_items.name: environmentConfigurationId
nested_items.description: The configuration ID of the environment.

nested_items.name: environmentProfileId
nested_items.description: The profile identifier of the environment.

nested_items.name: glossaryTerms
nested_items.description: The glossary terms to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironment action.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the environment that is to be updated.

nested_items.name: lastDeployment
nested_items.description: The last deployment of the environment.

nested_items.name: deploymentId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the last deployment of the environment.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the last deployment of the environment.

nested_items.name: deploymentType
nested_items.description: The type of the last deployment of the environment.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: The failure reason of the last deployment of the environment.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code for the failure reason for the environment deployment.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message for the failure reason for the environment deployment.

nested_items.name: isDeploymentComplete
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the last deployment of the environment is complete.

nested_items.name: messages
nested_items.description: The messages of the last deployment of the environment.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironment action.

nested_items.name: projectId
nested_items.description: The project identifier of the environment.

nested_items.description: The provider identifier of the environment.

nested_items.name: provisionedResources
nested_items.description: The provisioned resources to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironment action.

nested_items.description: The name of a provisioned resource of this Amazon DataZone environment.

nested_items.description: The provider of a provisioned resource of this Amazon DataZone environment.

nested_items.description: The type of a provisioned resource of this Amazon DataZone environment.

nested_items.name: value

nested_items.description: The provisioning properties to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironment action.

nested_items.description: The cloud formation properties included as part of the provisioning properties of an environment blueprint.

nested_items.name: templateUrl
nested_items.description: The template URL of the cloud formation provisioning properties of the environment blueprint.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status to be updated as part of the UpdateEnvironment action.

nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the environment was updated.
